body.ab:
POST CARD
Address to be written on this side.

J.G. Smyly Esq
Trinity College
Dublin
Ireland.

G.P. X/ii being at the B.M. I asked King on
who says P.Marqris reading [ιππο]εχιας wont do.
I agree with you it is a bad book. The Roman part
is already largely upset by O.P.II vide P.M's
appendex. Wilcken wanted to review it for
the Archiv. But I of course have no time & have
suggested to him now that you should do it for him.
So I hope you will hear from him on the subject.
Wilcken agrees with you the Ptol. part is all wrong.
Yours B.P.G.
